resources.string: Custom lightweight steel frame. Unrestored in beautiful original condition. Lightly used and well kept. Full super record build.

With a weight that does not exceed 14.5 kilograms, we are facing the ideal weight, built for the day and for the duration of decades. Equipped with Shimano 6-speed gearbox, allows to face any city or environment that may arise. Equipped with useful components and quality necessary for the daily user of the bicycle: kickstand, changes, fenders, chain covers and led lights.
